string-array.name: string_results
string-array.item: You are very calm:)
In general, you are pretty calm:)
You are the devil in the flesh.:/

resources.string: If you love our app, please take a moment to rate it

string-array.name: string_questions
string-array.item: If I get angry, I can hit somebody.
I never get angry enough to throw objects.
I easily get angry, but quickly calmed down.
I do not always comply with requests.
It seems to me that the fate of me is unfair.
I know that people talk about me behind my back.
I can not resist the dispute, if people do not agree with me.
If I happened to deceive anyone, I felt painful remorse.
It seems to me that I was not able to hit the man.
When I get angry, then I slam the door.
Sometimes people just annoy me with their presence.
If I do not like a rule set, I want to break it.
Sometimes I envy gnaws at, although I do not show.
I think many people do not like me.
I demand that people respect my rights.
Sometimes I come to mind thoughts, which I am ashamed.
I know people who can bring me to a fight.
Sometimes I express the anger that banging his fist on the table.
I often feel like a powder keg ready to explode.
If someone poses as a chief, I am always doing it in defiance.
None of the people I really would hate.
Quite a lot of people envy me.
Even if I am angry, I do not resort to "strong" expressions.
People who shirk work, should feel guilty.
I rarely going to fight, even if someone hit me.
I can remember the case when I was so angry that he grabbed the first available object and broke it.
I am rude towards people who do not like me.
When talking with me commanding tone, I do not want to do.
I usually try to hide a bad attitude towards people.
Sometimes it seems to me that people laugh at me.
If someone annoys me, I am ready to say what I think about him.
It depresses me what I am not doing enough for my parents.
If someone hit me first, I did not answer him.
When I m disputing, I often raise my voice.
I do not get angry over small things.
When people from pretending themselves superior, I do all that they are not conceited.
I don not always get something good, that I deserve.
I do not have enemies who want to harm me.
I often threaten people, but not going to result in the threat of execution.
I do a lot of this, as later regret.
